footer.tagline: The ultimate online platform for playing boardgames with friends and family, no matter where they are.
section.hero.description: Experience the joy of playing boardgames with friends and family from anywhere in the world. Our platform offers the best online boardgaming experience with real-time multiplayer.
section.features.title: Play Anywhere, Anytime
section.features.subtitle: Our platform works seamlessly across all your devices, allowing you to enjoy your favorite boardgames wherever you are.
section.featuredBoardgames.title: Featured Boardgames
section.statistics.title: Our Community
section.statistics.subtitle: Join thousands of boardgame enthusiasts from around the world
section.contact.title: Get in Touch
section.contact.subtitle: Want to learn more about our platform or have questions? Reach out to us and our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

catan.title: Catan
catan.description: Build settlements, trade resources, and outmaneuver your opponents in this classic strategy game.

ticketToRide.title: Ticket to Ride
ticketToRide.description: Connect cities with train routes to complete destination tickets and build the longest railway network.

pandemic.title: Pandemic
pandemic.description: Work together as a team to treat infections around the world while gathering resources for cures.
